sense.gloss: to bring with, to take along
to hold fast deep in (one's mouth or other orifice, often used in a sexual context)
to bring in a man for sex
to look on enviously while doing nothing, to hold a finger in one's mouth
smoking a cigarette without holding it with one's fingers, holding a cigarette in one's mouth

sdata.j: ↑今朝↑↓けさ↓パンを↑咥↑↓くわ↓えながら↑走↑↓はし↓る↑女子高↑↓じょしこう↓↑生↑↓せい↓を↑見↑↓み↓ました。
sdata.e: I saw a secondary school girl running with bread in her mouth this morning.
